fields.name: account_number
fields.description: Unique identifier for the specific account

fields.name: statement_period
fields.description: Period covered by the bank statement (e.g., Monthly Statement for January 2023)

fields.name: logo_path
fields.description: Path to the logo image of Wells Fargo

fields.name: account_holder_address
fields.description: Address associated with the account holder

fields.name: summary.beginning_date
fields.description: Start date of the statement period

fields.name: summary.beginning_balance
fields.description: Initial balance at the beginning of the statement period

fields.name: summary.deposits_total
fields.description: Total deposits made during the statement period

fields.name: summary.withdrawals_total
fields.description: Total withdrawals made during the statement period

fields.name: summary.ending_date
fields.description: End date of the statement period

fields.name: summary.ending_balance
fields.description: Final balance at the end of the statement period

fields.name: transaction.description
fields.description: Description or purpose of the transaction

fields.name: transaction.deposits_credits
fields.description: Amount deposited in a specific transaction

fields.name: transaction.withdrawals_debits
fields.description: Amount withdrawn in a specific transaction

fields.name: transaction.ending_balance
fields.description: Balance after the completion of the specific transaction
